about_the_game:
The Soundtrack of Blossom Tales: The Sleeping King consists of 42 retro styled songs composed by Visager.

Tracklist


1. Title Screen
2. Story by the Fire
3. Blossom Town
4. Castle Interior
5. Castle Dungeon
6. Crocus Bad Times
7. Sleep Room
8. Overworld
9. Haven Village
10. Golem's Haven
11. Runestone Temple
12. Miniboss
13. Ninja Fight
14. Pirate Queen
15. Gasping Marshes
16. Boiling Caverns
17. Winterthaw
18. Lift Ambience
19. Pinecone Village
20. Frost Zone
21. Frostroot Dungeon
22. Bossier
23. Wasteland Passage
24. Wasteland
25. Crocus Castle
26. Crocus Battle
27. Game Over
28. Shopping
29. Race!
30. Cave
31. Fairy Cave
32. Disciples of the Rose
33. Secret
34. Inn
35. Bomb Shop
36. Feather Trader
37. Baker Jenn
38. Scarol the Witch
39. Grunda the Other Witch
40. Zombie Guy
41. Flute Guy
42. Post Office
43. Shooting Gallery
44. Sage the Mage
